addReview.description: Label for the button to add a review for the application.

allowPermissions.description: Label for the button to allow permissions for the application.

autoScroll.description: Label for the switch to control whether to automatically scroll to each item while scraping.

back.description: Label for the button to go back to the previous screen.

changeList.description: Label for the button to change the list to scrape.

changeSelectionLevel.description: Description of the action to change the selection level when selecting an element.

chooseFile.description: Label for the button to choose a file to upload.

clickLoadMore.description: Label for the option to click a button to load more items on the same page when scraping.
clickLoadMore.message: Click button to load more items on same page

clickNextPage.description: Label for the option to click a link to navigate to the next page to load more items when scraping.
clickNextPage.message: Click link to navigate to next page

column.description: Label for the <select> element to select the column containing URLs to scrape from the uploaded CSV.

continue.description: Label for the button to continue to the next screen.

copy.description: Label for the button to copy the data to the clipboard.

csvFile.description: Label for the file input to upload a CSV file

defaultScraperName.description: Default name for a details pages scraper.

delete.description: Label for the menu item to delete the scraper.

duration.description: Label to show the duration of the current scrape.

export.description: Label for the menu item to export the scraper.

extractData.description: Label for the menu item to run the scrape and extract data from each URL.

finish.description: Label for the button to finish selecting elements on the page.

headerRow.description: Help text to explain that the uploaded CSV file must start with a header row.
headerRow.message: Must start with a header row

headerRowRequired.description: Warning to show when header row appears to be missing from the uploaded CSV.

help.description: Label for the button to open the help page.

hideOptions.description: Label for the button to hide more options for scraping.

import.description: Label for the menu item to import a scraper.

install.description: Label for the button to install the latest version of the application.

invalidTab.description: Error message when target tab is open to a restricted site.
invalidTab.message: This page is restricted. Try another site.

invalidVersion.description: Instruct the user to install the latest version of the application.
invalidVersion.message: $APP_NAME$ is out of beta! Install the latest version to get the newest updates.

items.description: Label to show the number of items scraped when scraping a list.

loadMoreAction.description: Label for the <select> element to select how to load more items when scraping.

max.description: Label for the input to control the maximum time to wait when loading more items or pages.

maxItems.description: Label for the input to set a maximum limit on the number of items to scrape.

maxItemsHelp.description: Help text to inform the user that they should leave the max items input blank to not set a limit.

maxItemsReached.description: Alert description to indicate that the maximum limit on the number of items to scrape has been reached.
maxItemsReached.message: Successfully scraped up to the specified limit. Increase the max items option to continue scraping.

mediaUrl.description: Label for the media URL field captured from an element.

min.description: Label for the input to control the minimum time to wait when loading more items or pages.

missingTabError.description: Error message when unable to access target tab data.
missingTabError.message: The tab you were using for this task has been closed. Please close this window and try again.

missingTabPermission.description: Error message when unable to access target tab data.
missingTabPermission.message: Unable to access tab. Close this window and try again.

missingUrlColumn.description: Error message when the CSV file is missing columns with URLs.
missingUrlColumn.message: Unable to find column with URLs. Please select another file.

newScraper.description: Label for the button to create a new scraper.

noData.description: Placeholder in table when there is no data to show.

noFileChosen.description: Message shown when no file has been chosen.

noList.description: Placeholder to show when list cannot be found on page.
noList.message: Unable to find list on page

none.description: Label for the option to not load more items when scraping.

options.description: Label for the button to show options for the scraper.

pages.description: Label to show the number of pages scraped when scraping a list.

permissionsDescription.description: Help text for explaining that the application needs additional permissions to access and scrape URLs.
permissionsDescription.message: $APP_NAME$ needs additional permissions to access and scrape URLs

preview.description: Badge text to indicate that the data shown is a preview of the scraper.

remainingPages.description: Label to show the number of pages remaining to be scraped when scraping details pages.

rename.description: Label for the menu item to rename the scraper.

reviewDescription.description: Ask the user to leave a review for the application.
reviewDescription.message: Hi, I'm $NAME$. I created $APP_NAME$ to help people save time. If you enjoy using it, I'd appreciate a 5-star rating to help others discover $APP_NAME$. Thanks so much!

reviewTitle.description: Thank the user for using the application.

scrapeDetails.description: Label for the option to show the screen for scraping details pages for each item in a list.

scrapeDetailsTipDescription.description: Description for the tip to educate the user about scraping details pages.
scrapeDetailsTipDescription.message: To scrape each URL in the list, select "$LABEL$" from the menu in the top right corner after downloading the list as a CSV file.

scrapeDetailsTipTitle.description: Title for the tip to educate the user about scraping details pages.

scrapeList.description: Label for the option to show the screen for scraping a list.

scrapedPages.description: Label to show the number of pages scraped when scraping details pages.

scrapingComplete.description: Alert heading to indicate that scraping has completed.

scrapingStatus.description: Label to indicate that scraping is in progress.

scrollDelay.description: Label for the input to control how long to wait in milliseconds when scrolling to each item while scraping.

scrollDown.description: Label for the option to scroll down to load more items when scraping.
scrollDown.message: Scroll down to load more items

select.description: Label for the button to select an element on the page.

selectElement.description: Title to display when selecting an element.

selectField.description: Description of the action to select the field to capture.

selectList.description: Title to display when selecting a list.

selectScraper.description: Label for the menu item to select a scraper to use to scrape each URL.

selectScraperOption.description: Instruction to select a scraper for the current domain.

showOptions.description: Label for the button to show more options for scraping.

startScraping.description: Label for the button to start scraping.

stopScraping.description: Label for the button to stop scraping.

tabNotFound.description: Error message when target tab does not exist.
tabNotFound.message: No tab found. Close this window and try again.

testUrl.description: Label for the text input for the test URL to use when selecting a scraper.

text.description: Label for the text field captured from an element.

uploadUrls.description: Label for the menu item to upload a file with URLs to scrape.

url.description: Label for the URL field captured from an element.

urlFieldWarning.description: Warning to display when the selected column name is a URL and the CSV file may be missing a header row.
urlFieldWarning.message: Column name appears to be a URL. Please ensure the CSV file starts with a header row containing the names of the columns.

verify.description: Label for the button to verify a selected element by highlighting it on the page.

waitTimeItems.description: Label for the inputs to control how long to wait in seconds when loading more items.
waitTimeItems.message: Wait time for loading more items (seconds)

waitTimePages.description: Label for the inputs to control how long to wait in seconds when loading pages.
